
---
title: '小米推出新款 T302 电动牙刷，首发 179 元'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/8/f4f2ebc5-ad49-40d9-8424-92819cc4a340.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Sat, 13 Aug 2022 09:06:17 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/8/f4f2ebc5-ad49-40d9-8424-92819cc4a340.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="8aa6"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 8 月 13 日消息，小米现已上架新款 T302 电动牙刷，配备四只刷头，售价 199 元，首发 179 元。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="3edd"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/8/f4f2ebc5-ad49-40d9-8424-92819cc4a340.png" w="1104" h="1144" title="小米推出新款 T302 电动牙刷，首发 179 元" width="1104" height="850" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="b663">据介绍， <strong>小米 T302 电动牙刷拥有 4 种清洁模式</strong>，“标准清洁”可满足绝大部分用户的日常清洁需求；“敏感轻柔”提供柔和的刷牙体验，呵护新手用户和敏感用户；“牙龈按摩”模式下刷毛摆幅交替变化，清洁按摩牙龈沟，针对牙龈敏感或出血的用户；“美白抛光”模式下刷头摆动变频拋光，刷净顽固污渍。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="9718"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/8/1ed1849d-b643-4aea-bc92-cb9821313d2a.png" w="1048" h="826" title="小米推出新款 T302 电动牙刷，首发 179 元" width="1048" height="646" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="56f9">IT之家了解到，<strong>小米 T302 电动牙刷搭载无刷电机，标准模式下续航 65 天</strong>，敏感轻柔下续航 159 天；IPX8 全身防水，配备无线充电底座，2 分钟应急闪充可刷牙一次。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BANoJK1olXDYCVV9cCk4WC24LE10lGVlaCgFtUQ5SQi0DBUVNGFJeSwUIFxlJX3EIGloUXwMDXF9eAE0IWipURmtxKnhaDBoOEi5FSz9JeR5-CG1GNis9BEcnBm4BE1IQXAcGZF1fD0kRB2oLHGt2OmhfFw44VRQSBl8IHmtDMwYDVV9cCU4XAG04GVoUXw4FUV1eDnsXBGgJGVIVWA8GUlhcOEsfBF9UWQlUHzYyZF1tOHsXM2w4RTUUDgYAUwlaDCVKBCxWEwZQGGgBXV9aDEITCmw4GVoUXwQyZA" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="100034090297"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/187817/16/28399/280237/62f678c1Ebaba2631/c4ec601f79a0901f.jpg" title="小米推出新款 T302 电动牙刷，首发 179 元" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name">米家 小米电动牙刷 T302 声波震动 4 种净齿模式</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price"> 179 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir>
          
</div>
